name: Kamaria
description:
Kamaria tells the story of a scientist who makes some experiments and then goes wrong, causing the scientist to be sucked in and reappear in another dimension that was the age of pirates 3,000 years ago. Scientists will be able to return to his age, he must collect all 7 Key Stones to return to the era the scientist came from.

But collecting the Key Stone is not an easy task because we have to face many obstacles such as monsters and creatures that we have never met before including the most dangerous pirates.

Each Key Stone has different abilities that we can apply to our weapons. The ability of that weapon will change according to the type of Key Stone that the player applied.

The following game will be single-player with an Isometric- Top Down camera angle. Movement of the character will use the WASD keys and other keys will be pressed to use skills or abilities within the game. The game will represent a scientist whose experiment went wrong and led him into the pirate era. This game is suitable for hardcore gamer.
